items.name: Horror March
enchantMods: Regenerate 2% of Life per second if you were Hit Recently

socketedItems.secDescrText: Spends a portion of your mana to grant a buff that takes some of the damage from hits for you until depleted. The buff grants added lightning damage based on the amount of mana spent by this skill. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.
explicitMods:
75% of Damage from Hits is taken from Buff before your Life or Energy Shield
Buff can take Damage equal to Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
Buff grants Added Lightning Damage equal to 14% of Mana Spent by this Skill's effect
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell will track how much mana you spend on it, granting a buff when the total mana spent reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, mines or skills with a reservation.
explicitMods:
Gain Arcane Surge after Spending a total of 400 Mana on
Upfront Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill

Arcane Surge grants 20% increased Cast Speed
Arcane Surge grants 58% increased Mana Regeneration rate
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Spell Damage
Supported Skills deal 25% more Spell Damage while you have Arcane Surge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies deal 16 to 248 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 21% more Spell Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports aura skills that reserve life or mana to create auras around you.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 24% increased Aura effect

Supported Skills also count as Blessing Skills
You can only have one Aura on you from your Blessing Skills
Your Non-Blessing Skills which Reserve Mana are Disabled while you have an Aura from a Supported Skill on you
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Chaos Damage taken does not bypass Energy Shield during effect

Removes all but one Life on use

Let the pain push outwards and turn away your enemy's blows.

flavourText: By my hand, the inert is given life.
By my hand, that which rots is reborn.
There is nothing that cannot be changed.
Nothing.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.

You cannot Cast Supported Triggerable Spells directly

socketedItems.secDescrText: Place a Frost Shield that drains your energy shield for one second or until you run out, gaining stages while this drain occurs. The Frost Shield takes some damage from hits in place of you and allies while in its area. Enemies in the area are Chilled. You can only have one Frost Shield active at once.
explicitMods: 29% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies in Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
60% of Damage dealt to you or Allies in Area with Hits by Enemies outside Area is taken from Frost Shield's Life before your Life or Energy Shield
You gain +0.37% to Spell Critical Strike Chance per Stage while in Area
Frost Shield has 870 maximum Life per Stage
Gains 1 Stage every 0.3 seconds while you are losing Energy Shield
You lose 690 Energy Shield per second
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.
explicitMods: Gains a Stage when you Spend a total of 389 Mana while in Area
Enemies in Area deal 19% less Damage while at maximum Stages
Buff grants 7 to 135 Added Lightning Damage per Stage
Buff Grants 14% chance to Shock enemies
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

the mind's limits end.
